items.title: 7-Zip
items.content_html: Version 24.09 published on 2024-11-29. The summary of changes are: This release includes updates for better performance and compatibility with modern systems. New platform-specific installers are added for improved user experience. Bug fixes and minor enhancements are also included.

items.title: awscli2
items.content_html: Version 2.24.15 published on 2023-10-xx. The summary of changes are: Updated API with new features, bug fixes, and enhanced functionality including support for tagging and improved usability. Notable changes include Bedrock Flows model support and enhancements to MediaConvert and SSM.

items.title: azurecli
items.content_html: Version 2.69.0 published on 2023-02-11. The summary of changes are: This update includes various bug fixes and improvements for a better user experience. Refer to the official release notes for detailed changes.

items.title: bicepcli
items.content_html: Version v0.33.93 published on 2025-01-29. The summary of changes are: This release addresses language server crashes, deployment failures with looped resources, and introduces Release Deployment Pane as a non-experimental feature.

items.title: bruno
items.content_html: Version v1.39.1 published on 2025-02-20. The summary of changes are: Released updates for efficient bru file parsing using worker threads, improved bug and feature request templates, and addressed minor fixes for streamlined functionality.

items.title: clink
items.content_html: Version v1.7.11 published on 2023-02-28. The summary of changes are: Improved diagnostics output, added error code messages, and fixed hints and scrollbar heights.

items.title: dbeaver
items.content_html: Version 25.0.0 published on 2025-03-02. The summary of changes are: DBeaver Community 25.0.0 introduces milestone updates and remains free and open source for all users. This release ensures compatibility and performance enhancements for diverse database systems. The package is available across multiple platforms with the latest improvements.

items.title: dive
items.content_html: Version v0.12.0 published on 2024-02-02. The summary of changes are: Version 0.12.0 includes support for Docker 25+ compatibility, new features for GitLab CI usage, and resolved bugs improving local image analysis and vulnerability detection.

items.title: docker-desktop
items.content_html: Version 4.38.0 published on 2025-01-30. The summary of changes are: Introduced the ability to create multi-node Kubernetes clusters and independently update Docker Compose, Docker Scout, the Docker CLI, and Ask Gordon without a full restart. Enhanced troubleshooting with improved Docker Desktop CLI commands for Mac. Various bug fixes and performance improvements across all platforms.

items.title: Buiild Apps SDK
items.content_html: Version 6.0.428 published on November 12, 2024. The summary of changes are: This release includes the latest updates and improvements for building .NET applications. It ensures better performance and compatibility. Note: Earlier versions have reached their end of life.

items.title: Build Apps SDK
items.content_html: Version 8.0.406 published on February 11, 2025. The summary of changes are: The release 8.0.406 includes all necessary tools to build and run .NET applications with added improvements for stability and performance.

items.title: drawio
items.content_html: Version 26.0.16 published on 2025-02-24. The summary of changes are: Updates to draw.io core 26.0.16 and uses Electron 34.2.0. This build includes all changes from version 26.0.16.

items.title: etlp2pcapng
items.content_html: Version v1.11.0 published on 2023-06-08. The summary of changes are: Handle pktmon captures more gracefully, improving the processing of these capture files.

items.title: ffmpeg
items.content_html: Version 7.1 published on 2024-09-30. The summary of changes are: FFmpeg 7.1 'PÃ©ter' introduces updates to all major libraries ensuring improved performance, features, and stability. This release branch was derived from the master branch on 2024-09-24. Users should look for enhanced multimedia support and faster builds in this version.

items.title: gateway
items.content_html: Version 2024.3.3 published on 2025-02-13. The summary of changes are: The Gateway 2024.3.3 is out with minor updates.

items.title: git-win
items.content_html: Version v2.48.1.windows.1 published on 2025-02-13. The summary of changes are: Git for Windows v2.48.1 brings updated components such as Git v2.48.1 and cURL v8.12.1. It also introduces a default Windows-native HTTPS transport backend for new installations and fixes issues like credential helper errors and misleading warnings for .gitignore directories.

items.title: cli
items.content_html: Version v1.53.0 published on 2025-02-14. The summary of changes are: Added support for new update checks, improved CI cancel command, and enhanced functionality for managing labels.

items.title: gitlab release cli
items.content_html: Version v0.22.0 published on 2025-02-17. The summary of changes are: Release v0.22.0 with branch merge 'release-0-22-0' into 'master'; includes updates and improvements to the tool.

items.title: gitlab-runner-agent
items.content_html: Version v17.9.0 published on 2025-02-20. The summary of changes are: This release includes updated changes to the CHANGELOG and other minor updates. Refer to the documentation for more details.

items.title: golang
items.content_html: Version 1.24.0 published on unknown. The summary of changes are: The release includes updates for performance and security along with various bug fixes. See the release notes for complete details.

items.title: golang1.21
items.content_html: Version 1.21.13 published on 2024-08-06. The summary of changes are: Go 1.21.13 includes fixes to the go command, the covdata command, and the bytes package.

items.title: golang1.22
items.content_html: Version 1.22.12 published on 2025-02-04. The summary of changes are: Includes security fixes to the crypto/elliptic package, as well as bug fixes to the compiler and the go command.

items.title: golang1.23
items.content_html: Version 1.23.6 published on 2025-02-04. The summary of changes are: Includes security fixes to the crypto/elliptic package and bug fixes to the compiler and the go command.

items.title: helm
items.content_html: Version v3.17.1 published on 2025-02-12. The summary of changes are: Helm v3.17.1 is a patch release addressing several updates and bug fixes. Users are encouraged to upgrade for the best experience. The community and collaboration opportunities continue to grow.

items.title: inkscape
items.content_html: Version  published on . The summary of changes are: Unable to retrieve the latest version information due to an error in the provided webpage content.

items.title: IntelliJ IDEA
items.content_html: Version 2024.3.4 published on 2025-02-27. The summary of changes are: This release includes fixes for gitlab-ci.yml key warnings, text copying improvements, proper handling of AWS providers in Terraform, and resolves Kafka plugin issues.

items.title: jmeter
items.content_html: Version 5.6.3 published on 2024-01-07. The summary of changes are: Latest stable release with bug fixes and performance improvements.

items.title: jq
items.content_html: Version 1.7.1 published on 2023-12-13. The summary of changes are: Fixes for security vulnerabilities (CVE-2023-50246, CVE-2023-50268), improved CLI features like inline script passing and better compatibility, along with several optimizations and memory leak fixes.

items.title: kubectl
items.content_html: Version 1.32.2 published on 2025-02-11. The summary of changes are: This release includes critical updates and stability fixes for Kubernetes 1.32. It is part of the ongoing patch support schedule. Users are encouraged to upgrade for optimal performance and security.

items.title: make-win
items.content_html: Version 3.81 published on 2006-11-25. The summary of changes are: This release ensures compatibility with MS-Windows systems and enhances file dependency tracking, allowing only required non-source files to update based on source changes.

items.title: maven
items.content_html: Version 3.9.9 published on 2025-02-28. The summary of changes are: Apache Maven 3.9.9 includes the latest bug fixes and improvements, making it the recommended version for all users. It maintains compatibility with JDK 8 and above and supports building against older JDK versions using toolchains. This release ensures enhanced reliability and performance.

items.title: miniconda
items.content_html: Version 22.11.1 published on 2023-02-22. The summary of changes are: The latest release includes updates to conda for enhanced package management and bug fixes for improved stability.

items.title: node
items.content_html: Version 18.20.7 published on 2025-02-20. The summary of changes are: The latest stable release includes performance enhancements and stabilization of existing features for long-term support.

items.title: node16
items.content_html: Version 16.20.2 published on 2023-08-08. The summary of changes are: This is the latest stable release in the Node.js Gallium series, focusing on updates and maintenance for long-term support.

items.title: node18
items.content_html: Version 18.20.7 published on 2025-02-20. The summary of changes are: This release includes updates for stability and performance in Node.js Hydrogen version branch.

items.title: node20
items.content_html: Version 20.18.3 published on 2025-02-10. The summary of changes are: This release includes bug fixes and performance improvements while maintaining stability for developers.

items.title: node22
items.content_html: Version v22.14.0 published on 2025-02-11. The summary of changes are: This latest stable release includes updated npm v10.9.2 and ensures improved performance and critical bug fixes, making it ready for production use.

items.title: notepad-plus-plus
items.content_html: Version v8.7.7 published on 2025-02-07. The summary of changes are: The release addresses a regression in version 8.7.6 related to SCN_MODIFIED notification events with certain plugins and introduces the new API NPPM_ADDSCNMODIFIEDFLAGS.

items.title: openshift
items.content_html: Version 4.17.0-okd-scos.0 published on 2024-12-16T20:49:54Z. The summary of changes are: This release brings updated client tools and installation binaries. It includes enhanced compatibility with CentOS Stream CoreOS and minor upgrades to Kubernetes components. Refer to upgrade notes for clusters running OKD 4.15.

items.title: oraclejdk11
items.content_html: Version 11.0.26 published on 2025-01-21. The summary of changes are: This release includes IANA Time Zone data 2024b updates, enhanced security baselines, and support for thread, timestamp, and caller information in java.security.debug.

items.title: oraclejdk17
items.content_html: Version 17.0.14 published on 2025-01-21. The summary of changes are: This release includes bug fixes, an updated IANA Time Zone Database (2024b), and enhanced security measures. It conforms to version 17.1 of the Java SE Specification.

items.title: oraclejdk21
items.content_html: Version 21.0.6 published on 2025-01-21. The summary of changes are: JDK 21.0.6 includes IANA time zone data 2024b with updates for Mexico, Mongolia, and Portugal, upgrades various security baselines, and enhances compatibility with RFC 8536. It also resolves multiple issues, including those related to concurrency and HTTP limits.

items.title: oraclejdk8
items.content_html: Version 8u441 published on 2025-03-04. The summary of changes are: Latest General Availability (GA) release for JDK 8, including critical fixes and updates to enhance system reliability and performance.

items.title: powershell
items.content_html: Version 7.5.0 published on 2023-01-23. The summary of changes are: The v7.5.0 release includes updates to the .NET SDK, improves build and packaging processes, and updates Microsoft.PowerShell.PSResourceGet to v1.1.0. It also introduces minor fixes for the release pipeline and improves documentation.

items.title: putty
items.content_html: Version 0.83 published on 2025-02-08. The summary of changes are: Latest stable release with improved reliability and updates across all utilities. Offers comprehensive support for various Windows architectures. Recommended for general use and stability.

items.title: python
items.content_html: Version 3.13.2 published on 2025-02-04. The summary of changes are: This release includes fixes and enhancements for improved performance and stability. It is the latest stable version with bug fixes applied. Recommended for production use.

items.title: python3.10
items.content_html: Version 3.10.16 published on 2024-12-03. The summary of changes are: Python 3.10.16 includes the latest security updates and bug fixes, ensuring a more stable experience. This is part of the ongoing maintenance for the 3.10 series. Users are encouraged to upgrade for improved security.

items.title: python3.11
items.content_html: Version 3.11.11 published on 2024-12-03. The summary of changes are: This release focuses on security updates and minor improvements to ensure stability and robustness.

items.title: python3.12
items.content_html: Version 3.12.9 published on 2025-02-04. The summary of changes are: This release focuses on bug fixes and improvements for better stability and performance. It enhances the overall development experience in Python 3.12. No significant features have been added in this update.

items.title: python3.9
items.content_html: Version 3.9.21 published on 2024-12-03. The summary of changes are: This release contains the latest security fixes for Python 3.9 and marks continued support of the 3.9.x series.

items.title: rider
items.content_html: Version 2024.3.6 published on 2025-02-28. The summary of changes are: Rider 2024.3.6 resolves debugging session issues, fixes macOS freezes caused by Metal rendering, and addresses duplicate entries in the Go to Symbol search results.

items.title: screentogif
items.content_html: Version 2.41.1 published on 2024-09-08. The summary of changes are: Updated localizations for Chinese, Turkish, Arabic, and Dutch. Fixed Move Left/Right commands and extra color button issues. Minor fixes include typo corrections and enhanced stability.

items.title: task
items.content_html: Version v3.41.0 published on 2025-01-18. The summary of changes are: Fixed dynamic variable logging, added TASK_DIR variable, and addressed fatal bugs causing concurrent map writes.

items.title: terraform
items.content_html: Version 1.11.0 published on 2025-02-27. The summary of changes are: Introduces write-only attributes for resources and S3-native state locking. The terraform test improvements include JUnit XML reporting and enhanced test overrides. Updates to Azure backend authentication and several bug fixes are included.

items.title: vscode
items.content_html: Version 1.97.2 published on 2025-02-13. The summary of changes are: The update addresses critical issues. For complete details, refer to the release notes on Updates at code.visualstudio.com.

items.title: windows-terminal
items.content_html: Version 1.22.10352.0 published on 2023-02-06. The summary of changes are: Windows Terminal 1.22 brings a rewritten console hosting implementation that supports Sixels and grapheme clusters for enhanced Unicode support. It significantly improves performance and compatibility. This release is considered the stable version of the terminal.

items.title: winmerge
items.content_html: Version 2.16.46 published on 2025-01-27. The summary of changes are: This is a stable release that fixes critical bugs, including ALT-F4 behavior and drawing shift issues, and enhances folder comparison with a new prompt feature. Plugin and translation updates are also included, improving functionality and user experience. It's a recommended update for all users.

items.title: wireshark
items.content_html: Version 4.4.5 published on not specified. The summary of changes are: The latest stable release of Wireshark, version 4.4.5, supersedes all previous releases and includes updates for improved functionality and stability.

items.title: yq
items.content_html: Version v4.45.1 published on 2025-01-12. The summary of changes are: Introduced creation of parent directories when --split-exp is used and updated dependencies for better functionality.
